Package de.tif.jacob.core.definition

Interface Summary
IAdhocBrowserDefinition This interface represents an ad-hoc browser definition.
IApplicationDefinition This interface represents an application definition, i.e application design.
IBrowserDefinition This interface represents the definition of a browser, which could be used for either search or inform browsers.
IBrowserField This interface represents a browser field.
IBrowserTableField This interface represents a table browser field.
IContextMenuEntry This interface represents the definition of a group context menu entry.
IDefinition This interface represents an abstract definition used to fetch
table definitions table aliases browser definitions relations relation sets domain definitions by name.
IDomainDefinition This interface represents a domain definition.
IExternalFormDefinition This interface represents an external form definition.
IFormDefinition This interface represents a form definition.
IFormGroupDefinition This interface represents a domain definition.
IGroupContainerDefinition This interface represents a group container definition.
IGroupDefinition This interface represents a group definition.
IGUIElementDefinition This interface represents GUI elements on an abstract level.
IHtmlFormDefinition This interface represents a mutable form definition.
IHtmlGroupDefinition This interface represents a html group definition.
IJacobFormDefinition This interface represents a form definition.
IJacobGroupDefinition This interface represents a html group definition.
IKey This interface represents an abstraction of data source table keys.
IManyToManyRelation This interface represents a N:M relation.
IMutableFormDefinition This interface represents a mutable form definition.
IMutableGroupDefinition This interface represents a mutable group definition.
INamedObjectDefinition This interface is an abstract representation of named definition elements.
IOneToManyRelation This interface represents a 1:N relation.
IRelation This interface represents a relation.
IRelationSet This interface represents a relation set.
ISelectionActionDefinition  
ITableAlias This interface represents the definition of a table alias.
ITableAlias.ITableAliasConditionAdjuster Interface for adjustment of alias conditions.
ITableAliasCondition This interface represents a table alias condition.
ITableDefinition This interface represents the definition of data source table.
ITableField This interface represents the definition of a field within a data source table.
IToolbarButtonDefinition This interface represents the definition of a toolbar button.
IToolbarDefinition This interface represents the definition of a toolbar.
 

Class Summary
DataScope This class declares the different kinds of data scopes.
Filldirection This class declares the different kinds of fill directions.
KeyType This class declares the different types of table keys and their common characteristics, e.g. unique or not, etc.
SortOrder This class declares the different kinds of sort orders.
